filtered_cases.matched_vuln: Indirect Object Reference (IDOR) in Order Archiving
filtered_cases.reason: The scanner's finding directly matches the vulnerability definition in the rule: both concern a missing authorization check (IDOR) allowing unauthorized users to archive orders by manipulating the order_id parameter. The scanner recommends adding authorization checks to ensure only the order creator
filtered_cases.why_filtered: Patch failed - cthive correctly identified the vulnerability (true positive, not false positive)
